metadata.title: CVE-2016-7168 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the media_handle_uploadfunction in wp-admin/includes/media.php in WordPress before 4.6.1 mightallow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML by trickingan administrator into uploading an image file that has a crafted filename.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7168` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.6.1+dfsg-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wordpress package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.6.1+dfsg-1').
